## Final 20201030 

```bash
cd /usr/local/bin
ln -s /usr/local/opt/python@3/bin/python3 python3 
ln -s /usr/local/opt/python@3/bin/python3 python
```


## Article: The right and wrong way to set up Python 3 on MacOS | Opensource.com id=g_11567

[The right and wrong way to set up Python 3 on MacOS | Opensource.com](https://opensource.com/article/19/5/python-3-default-mac#what-to-do)

```clojure
❯ where python
/usr/local/bin/python
/usr/bin/python

~
❯ which python
/usr/local/bin/python

~
❯ /usr/bin/python --version
Python 2.7.10

~
❯ /usr/local/bin/python --version
Python 2.7.16
 
```

Edit `~/.zshrc`

```clojure
alias python=/usr/local/bin/python3
alias pip=/usr/local/bin/pip3
alias pip3=/usr/local/bin/pip3
```

```clojure
❯ python --version
Python 3.8.5
```
